meanings.definition: Able to be taken away or detached.
meanings.sent1: The stickers on my notebook are removeable.
meanings.sent2: The backpack has a removeable strap for easy carrying.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally stuck the removeable label on my forehead.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like a removeable light in the darkness of the room.
meanings.sent5: The removeable parts of the toy made it easy to clean.

meanings.definition: Capable of being eliminated or eradicated.
meanings.sent1: The stain on the shirt was not removeable no matter how hard I tried.
meanings.sent2: The unwanted weeds in the garden were removeable with the right tools.
meanings.sent3: The removeable odor in the kitchen made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: His doubts were like removeable clouds on a sunny day.
meanings.sent5: The removeable virus was finally eradicated from the computer system.
